SEARCH
Package org.dataaccess.discipline

Interface IDisciplineRepository

All Superinterfaces:
IRepository<Discipline>
All Known Implementing Classes:
DisciplineRepository
public interface IDisciplineRepository extends IRepository<Discipline>
Represents a repository interface for managing Discipline entities. Extends the IRepository interface with Discipline as the generic type. This interface defines the repository operations that can be performed, specific to discipline repository.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Discipline
    createNewDiscipline(String name, int credits)
    Creates a new Discipline with the given name and credits.

    Retrieves a Discipline by its name.

    delete, deleteMany, getById, readAll, save, validate

  • Method Details

    • getByName

      Discipline getByName(String name) throws RepositoryOperationException, ValidationException
      Retrieves a Discipline by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Discipline to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Discipline with the specified name.
      Throws:
      RepositoryOperationException - If an error occurs during the repository operation.
      ValidationException - If the provided name is invalid.

    • createNewDiscipline

      Discipline createNewDiscipline(String name, int credits) throws RepositoryOperationException, ValidationException
      Creates a new Discipline with the given name and credits.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the new Discipline.
      credits - The number of credits associated with the new Discipline.
      Returns:
      The newly created Discipline.
      Throws:
      RepositoryOperationException - If an error occurs during the repository operation.
      ValidationException - If the provided name or credits are invalid.
